attributes.action: Public inquiry into Kremlin interference with UK Democracy
attributes.additional_details: Russian interference in western politics is an open secret and it needs to be rooted out immediately.
attributes.background: Start a wide ranging public inquiry into Russian money in British politics, and investigate what if any interference there has been in our recent elections. The head of the inquiry should have cross party support to ensure the results are fair and balanced.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609388
